title: Add new square logo asset and display it in header branding

requirements.summary: Create a crisp, centered, square logo image derived from download-1.webp and store it as a static generated asset.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file exists under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The created logo is square, centered, and visually clean (no unintended padding/cropping), and renders crisply on mobile and desktop.
The app builds successfully after adding the new asset.

file_operations.description: Add a processed, web-ready square logo image generated from the provided download-1.webp; ensure the subject is centered with no unintended padding/cropping and that it remains crisp at common header sizes.

requirements.summary: Update the sticky header brand area to show the new logo next to the existing brand text with responsive alignment and no distortion.
acceptanceCriteria: The header shows the new logo next to the brand text on desktop and mobile.
The logo maintains correct aspect ratio (no stretching), is not visibly cropped, and stays aligned with the text baseline/stack.
Header layout remains responsive: brand area does not overflow or cause the navigation/CTA layout to break at common breakpoints.
No other site interactions (scroll-to-section, menu toggle, Call Now, WhatsApp CTAs) regress.

file_operations.description: Import and render the static logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/king-kingdom-logo-from-upload-1.dim_1024x1024.png inside the brand button alongside the existing text; apply responsive sizing (fixed square box), object-fit containment, and spacing so the logo is never stretched/cropped and the brand area stays aligned and non-overflowing across breakpoints.
